TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlLanguage extends System.Object
public ref class XamlLanguage abstract sealed

summary.span: 定义一些提供字符串或对象的常量，这些字符串或对象对于 XAML 标记或使用 XAML 类型进行的编程非常有用。

span.span: Defines constants that provide strings or objects that are useful for XAML markup or for programming with XAML types.

summary.span: 这些字符串或对象与 XAML 语言概念和/或 .NET XAML 中 XAML 语言概念的实现有关。

span.span: These strings or objects are relevant to XAML language concepts, to the implementation of XAML language concepts in .NET XAML Services, or to both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks API 将返回基于保持内部的 XAML 架构上下文的查找结果。The API returns lookup results that are based on a XAML schema context that remains internal. 在此架构上下文中， 为 `true` 。In this schema context, is `true`. 否则，将报告为 .NET Framework XAML 服务及其定义的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的默认值的 XAML 架构上下文使用默认设置。Otherwise, the XAML schema context that is reported as the default for .NET Framework XAML Services and its defined XAML readers and XAML writers uses default settings. 总体而言，用于预定义的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的 XAML 架构上下文基于 可通过设置或返回的 api 提供的同一实例 。Overall, the XAML schema context that is used for predefined XAML readers and XAML writers is based on the same instance that is available from APIs that set or return a . .NET Framework XAML 服务的默认 XAML 架构上下文基于 CLR 概念和反射。The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services is based on CLR concepts and reflection. 在查看时，可以找到默认 CLR 支持的证据 。Evidence of the default CLR backing can be found when obtaining certain properties that are a and when checking . 同样， 是的属性 具有基于 CLR 反射的值 。Similarly, properties that are a have CLR reflection-based values for .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllDirectives As ReadOnlyCollection(Of XamlDirective)

summary.span: 获取由 .NET XAML 服务定义的每个 标识符的只读泛型集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only generic collection of each identifier that is defined by .NET XAML Services.

value.span: .NET XAML 服务定义的每个标识符的只读泛型集合 。

span.span: A read-only generic collection of each identifier that is defined by .NET XAML Services.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllTypes As ReadOnlyCollection(Of XamlType)

summary.span: 获取单独 值的只读泛型集合，这些值与 XAML 语言内部值匹配或其别名设置为该内部值，并且是由 .NET XAML 服务定义的。

span.span: Gets a read-only generic collection of individual values that match, or alias, a XAML language intrinsic that is defined by .NET XAML Services.

value.span: 与 XAML 语言内部值匹配的每个 的只读泛型集合。

span.span: A read-only generic collection of each that matches a XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关内部 XAML 语言信息项的列表，请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) 。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) for a list of intrinsic XAML language information items. 请注意，并非作为5.2 的子节列出的所有项都实现为 。Note that not all items that are listed as subsections of 5.2 are implemented as a . 例如，不 `x:Code` 是类型。For example, `x:Code` is not a type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Arguments As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Arguments { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取工厂方法或泛型用法的 的 。

span.span: Gets a for the of a factory method or a generic usage.

value.span: 工厂方法或泛型用法的 的 。

span.span: A for the of a factory method or generic usage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工厂方法是 XAML 2009 功能，用于标识构造 XAML 类型的基础类型的替代方法。A factory method is a XAML 2009 feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. `Arguments`指定工厂方法的输入，并启用在标记中指定该信息。The `Arguments` specify the input of a factory method and enable specifying that information in markup. 缺少工厂方法的默认方法是尝试查找无参数的构造函数，然后尝试查找类型、成员或目标类型的标识的类型转换器。The default techniques, in absence of a factory method, are to attempt to find a parameterless constructor and then attempt to find an identified type converter for type, member, or destination type. 对于一般用法，将 `Arguments` 根据需要为指定的所有构造输入包装对象或初始化文本 `TypeArguments` 。For the generic usage, the `Arguments` wrap the objects or initialization text of all construction inputs that are specified as necessary for the `TypeArguments`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property FactoryMethod As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ FactoryMethod { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 ，它标识 XAML 的工厂方法。

span.span: Gets a that identifies a factory method for XAML.

value.span: 一个 ，它标识 XAML 的工厂方法。

span.span: A that identifies a factory method for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工厂方法是 XAML 2009 功能，用于标识构造 XAML 类型的基础类型的替代方法。A factory method is a XAML 2009 feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. 如果工厂方法不可用，则默认方法是尝试查找无参数的构造函数，然后尝试查找类型、成员或目标类型上的标识的类型转换器。The default technique, if a factory method is unavailable, is to try to find a parameterless constructor, and then try to find an identified type converter on type, member, or destination type.

public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ FieldModifier { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.10](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.10](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Initialization As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Initialization { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此指令表示初始化文本的 XAML 节点或 XAML 信息集表示形式，其中对象元素中的字符串提供了周围对象元素的类型构造信息。This directive represents the XAML node or XAML information set representation of initialization text, where a string within an object element supplies the type construction information for the surrounding object element. 如果你查看的是原始节点解释或可视化效果， `Initialization` 有时会以字符串形式出现，如 `_Initialization` (记下前导下划线) 并且位于 XAML 语言 xaml 命名空间中 (前面的节点) 为该命名空间 `Namespace` 。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `Initialization` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Initialization` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node). 在 [MS-CHAP] 中，此概念在标题下面进行了介绍 `x:InitializationText` 。In [MS-XAML], this concept is described under the heading `x:InitializationText`. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Items { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Items`指令是围绕周围对象中的多个对象值的节点表示器包装。An `Items` directive is a node representation wrapper around multiple object values within a surrounding object. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 如果检查原始 XAML 节点流解释或可视化效果， `Items` 有时会以字符串形式出现，如 `_Items` (记下前导下划线) 并且位于 XAML 语言 xaml 命名空间中 (前面的节点) 为该命名空间 `Namespace` 。If you examine raw XAML node stream interpretations or visualizations, `Items` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Items` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Key { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Key`指令用于字典中的对象。A `Key` directive is used for objects in a dictionary. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

span.span: A for the type that is the item type of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Framework XAML 服务实现中， `Member` 由进行支持 。In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the `Member` is backed by .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Members As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Members { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the concept in XAML.

value.span: XAML 中 概念的 。

span.span: A for the concept in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Members`概念在 [ms-chap] 中未明确定义。The `Members` concept is not specifically defined in [MS-XAML]. `Members` 是一种用于在标记本身定义类型成员的概念，而不是引用支持类型。`Members` is a concept for defining members of types in markup itself, as opposed to referencing backing types. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Name As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Name { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Name`指令用于标记中对象的标识符。A `Name` directive is used for identifiers of objects in markup. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 尽管的这一概念 `Name` 与 [ms-chap] 中指定的用法并不完全一致，但你通常可以使用 `Name` 指令或 `Name` 特性来提供标记中 xaml 对象与由标记的 xaml 处理创建的运行时表示形式之间的概念连接。Although this concept of `Name` is not completely consistent with the use that is specified in [MS-XAML], you can typically use the `Name` directive or the `Name` attribute to provide a conceptual connection between XAML objects in markup and the run-time representations that are created by XAML processing of the markup. 此使用取决于特定框架如何实现它们的编程模型，以便将 XAML 集成到其常规对象模型中。This use depends on how specific frameworks implement their programming models to integrate XAML into their general object models. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [X：Name 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive)。For more information, see [x:Name Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Null As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Null { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 或 XAML 语言内部值的 。

span.span: Gets a for the or XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: / XAML 语言内部函数的。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 类型为标记中的对象值提供 null 值。This XAML type provides null values for object values in markup. XAML 类型为 (或必须) 赋给 `MarkupExtension` 。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2.4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

value.span: XAML 语言概念的 。

span.span: A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML `x:Object` 将指定为特殊语言概念。XAML specifies `x:Object` as a special language concept. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2.5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PositionalParameters As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ PositionalParameters { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `PositionalParameters` 是一个指令，该指令包装多个对象，这些对象可指定为一组用于标记扩展的对象节点。`PositionalParameters` is a directive that wraps the multiple objects that can be specified as a set of object nodes for input of a markup extension. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 6.6.7](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 6.6.7](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 如果你查看的是原始节点解释或可视化效果， `PositionalParameters` 有时会以字符串形式出现，如 `_PositionalParameters` (记下前导下划线) 并且位于 XAML 语言 xaml 命名空间中 (前面的节点) 为该命名空间 `Namespace` 。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `PositionalParameters` is sometimes seen in string form as `_PositionalParameters` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Property` 是标识为的 XAML 类型的专用形式 。`Property` is a specialized form of the XAML type that is identified as .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Reference As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Reference { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

value.span: 一个 ，它表示 XAML 的 。

span.span: A that represents a for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Reference` 是一个 XAML 2009 功能，用于引用标记中的其他对象节点。`Reference` is a XAML 2009 feature for referencing another object node in the markup. .NET Framework XAML 服务的实现可在中找到 。The implementation for .NET Framework XAML Services is found in .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Shared As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Shared { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive for XAML.

value.span: XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Shared`当 (设置为 `true`) 指定在字典中找到某个项时，对对象的引用应始终返回单一实例，而不是返回新的实例。A `Shared` directive (when it is set to `true`) specifies that when an item is found in a dictionary, references to the object should always return the singleton instead of a new instance. 此行为与使用 XAML 的特定框架可以将字典用作共享内容或模板机制的源的概念相关。This behavior is related to the concept that a dictionary might be used as a source for a shared content or template mechanism by particular frameworks that use XAML. `Shared` 未在 [MS-XAML] 中指定，而是在 `x` WPF 中为 XAML 的命名空间定义的行为的一部分，并且 .NET Framework 版本3.0 和版本3.5。`Shared` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace-defined behavior for XAML in WPF and .NET Framework version 3.0 and version 3.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 类型为支持成员为静态成员的标记提供值。This XAML type provides values for markup where the backing member is a static member. XAML 类型为 (或必须) 赋给 `MarkupExtension` 。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.8](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.8](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SynchronousMode As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ SynchronousMode { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 ，利用它可以通过异步方式加载 XAML（如果 XAML 处理器支持此类模式）。

span.span: Gets a that enables loading XAML asynchronously if the XAML processor supports such a mode.

value.span: 一个 ，利用它可以通过异步方式加载 XAML。

span.span: A that enables loading XAML asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SynchronousMode`当设置为) 时，指令 (`Async` 用于指定在加载 XAML 文件时，先处理根节点。A `SynchronousMode` directive (when set to `Async`) is used to specify that when a XAML file is loaded, the root node is processed first. 即使对象的内容仍在处理，也可以插入生成的对象。The resulting object can be inserted even though its content is still processing. 在此模式中，可以绕过从最深层节点到根的默认 XAML 处理行为。In this mode you can bypass the default XAML processing behavior of working from deepest node to the root. 在 XAML 的默认处理逻辑中，正在等待根对象的任何调用方将被阻止，直到完全分析完成。In the default processing logic for XAML, any caller that is waiting for the root object is blocked until the full parse is complete. `SynchronousMode` 未在 [MS-CHAP] 中指定，而是在 `x` WPF 中 XAML 的命名空间定义行为的一部分，从 .NET Framework 版本 3.5 SP1 (或任何后续 Service Pack) 开始。`SynchronousMode` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace-defined behavior for XAML in WPF beginning in .NET Framework version 3.5 with SP1 (or any subsequent service pack).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TimeSpan As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ TimeSpan { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 语言中 概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the concept in XAML language.

value.span: XAML 语言概念的 。

span.span: A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2.16](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.16](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). `TimeSpan` 不是真正的内部函数，但是在 XAML 规范中指定的，因为它是一个常用的类型。`TimeSpan` is not a true intrinsic, but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a commonly used type. XAML 规范作者认为它可用于标准化派生词汇中的 XAML 表示形式。The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. 另请参阅 [常见 XAML 语言基元的内置类型](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives)。See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Type As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Type { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 / XAML 语言内部值的 。

span.span: Gets a for the / XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: / XAML 语言内部函数的。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 类型提供了一些 值，这些值使用和查找到后备类型系统的绑定。This XAML type provides values that use bindings from, and lookups to, a backing type system. XAML 类型为 (或必须) 赋给 `MarkupExtension` 。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2.3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TypeArguments As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ TypeArguments { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TypeArguments`当泛型指定为 XAML 对象时，指令指定泛型的类型约束。A `TypeArguments` directive specifies the type constraints of a generic when a generic is specified as a XAML object. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.11](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.11](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uid As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Uid { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Uid`指令指定 XAML 标记元素的唯一标识符。A `Uid` directive specifies a unique identifier for a XAML markup element. 严格地说，这种唯一标识符可在 XAML 实现框架内应用到若干目的。Strictly speaking, such a unique identifier could be applied to several purposes within a XAML-implementing framework. `Uid` 与 `Name` 中的不同，后者在 `Name` [MS-XAML] 定义中具有特定角色，用于声明 XAML 源的对象图输出中存在的标识符，而 `Uid` 没有特定的角色。`Uid` differs from `Name` in that `Name` has a specific role in the [MS-XAML] definition for declaring the identifiers that exist in an object graph output from a XAML source, whereas `Uid` has no specific role. 在使用 .NET Framework XAML 服务的现有 XAML 实现框架中， `Uid` 通常用于本地化目的。In the existing XAML-implementing frameworks that use .NET Framework XAML Services, `Uid` is typically used for localization purposes. 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.3.6](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.6](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UnknownContent As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ UnknownContent { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 XAML 获取 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: 来自 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnknownContent` 是一个指令，该指令是一个在 XAML 节点集中使用的占位符（如果读取器遇到值节点的未知内容或初始化文本） (没有可用的内部或文本语法可以将其转换) 。`UnknownContent` is a directive that is a placeholder to use in a XAML node set if a reader encounters unknown content for a value node or initialization text (no available intrinsic or text syntax can convert it). 如果你查看的是原始节点解释或可视化效果， `UnknownContent` 有时会以字符串形式出现，如 `_UnknownContent` (记下前导下划线) 并且位于 XAML 语言 xaml 命名空间中 (前面的节点) 为该命名空间 `Namespace` 。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `UnknownContent` is sometimes seen in string form as `_UnknownContent` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uri As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Uri { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 语言概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the XAML language concept.

value.span: XAML 语言概念的 。

span.span: A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 [[MS-XAML] 部分 5.2.15](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.15](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). `Uri` 不是真正的内部函数，但是在 XAML 规范中指定的，因为它是一种常用的类型。`Uri` is not a true intrinsic but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a frequently used type. XAML 规范作者认为它可用于标准化派生词汇中的 XAML 表示形式。The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. 另请参阅 [常见 XAML 语言基元的内置类型](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives)。See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives).

span.span: That namespace corresponds to the XAML (2006) "x" prefixed namespace as defined in [[MS-XAML] Section 5.1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
